components.title: Google Chrome Current Windows
components.description: Google Chrome Current Windows based on DOD SRG/STIG.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ac-4.

implemented-requirements.description: Firewall traversal from remote host must be disabled.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ac-4.15.

implemented-requirements.description:
Google Data Synchronization must be disabled.
Cloud print sharing must be disabled.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement au-10.

implemented-requirements.description:
Incognito mode must be disabled.
Session only based cookies must be disabled.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement au-12.

implemented-requirements.description:
Extensions installation must be blocklisted by default.
Deletion of browser history must be disabled.
Prompt for download location must be enabled.
Download restrictions must be configured.
Chrome Cleanup must be disabled.
Chrome Cleanup reporting must be disabled.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-6.
This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-7.

implemented-requirements.description:
Sites ability to show pop-ups must be disabled.
The default search providers name must be set.
The default search provider URL must be set to perform encrypted searches.
Default search provider must be enabled.
The Password Manager must be disabled.
The URL protocol schema javascript must be disabled.
Metrics reporting to Google must be disabled.
Search suggestions must be disabled.
Importing of saved passwords must be disabled.
WebUSB must be disabled.
Google Cast must be disabled.
Autoplay must be disabled.
Web Bluetooth API must be disabled.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement cm-7.1.

implemented-requirements.description: Use of the QUIC protocol must be disabled.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement ia-5.2.

implemented-requirements.description: Online revocation checks must be performed.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-13.

implemented-requirements.description: Chrome must be configured to allow only TLS.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-18.1.

implemented-requirements.description:
Site tracking users location must be disabled.
Safe Browsing must be enabled,
Safe Browsing Extended Reporting must be disabled.
Anonymized data collection must be disabled.
Collection of WebRTC event logs must be disabled.
Guest Mode must be disabled.
AutoFill for credit cards must be disabled.
AutoFill for addresses must be disabled.
Import AutoFill form data must be disabled.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-18.3.
This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-18.4.

implemented-requirements.description:
Extensions that are approved for use must be allowlisted.
URLs must be allowlisted for Autoplay use.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement sc-28.
This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement si-2.

implemented-requirements.description: The version of Google Chrome running on the system must be a supported version.

control-implementations.description: This is a partial implementation of the NIST_SP-800-53_rev4 catalog, focusing on the control enhancement si-11.

implemented-requirements.description: Chrome development tools must be disabled.
